snippet: Disagreements between the Port Authority and the foundation creating the National September 11 Memorial Museum have virtually stopped construction.
abstract: Construction at the National September 11 Memorial Museum has been halted for more than six months due to a multimillion-dollar dispute between the foundation creating it and the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, which is responsible for construction.
lead_paragraph: Disagreements between the Port Authority and the foundation creating the National September 11 Memorial Museum have virtually stopped construction.

headline.seo: Sept. 11 Memorial Museum Construction Is Frozen Over Financing
headline.main: Construction Frozen in a Fight Over Financing
headline.print_headline: Construction Frozen in a Fight Over Financing

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
